contentrichtext.text: '''Quebec Connection''' is a [[Canadian]] [[electronica|electronic music]] group from [[Montreal]].<ref>http://music.cbc.ca/#/artists/QUEBEC-CONNECTION</ref> The band's primary member is producer and musician Nathaniel Hebert, in collaboration with a female vocalist and lyricist who uses the [[stage name]] "Synergy Plus". The band's debut full length album, 2004's ''Bonjour Expo'', is inspired in part by the [[retro-futurism]] of Montreal's [[Expo 67]]. The album charted on ''[[Exclaim!|!earshot]]''<nowiki>'</nowiki>s campus radio charts in 2005, and has had airplay on [[CBC Radio 3]]. ==Discography== *2003 ''Smile and Dial'' *2004 ''Bonjour Expo'' ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.quebecconnection.ca/ Quebec Connection] official website{{Broken link|date=March 2012}} * [http://music.cbc.ca/#/artists/QUEBEC-CONNECTION Quebec Connection] at [[CBC Music]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Quebec Connection}} [[Category:Musical groups with year of establishment missing]] [[Category:Musical groups from Montreal]] [[Category:Canadian electronic music groups]] [[Category:English-language musical groups from Quebec]] {{Canada-band-stub}} {{electronic-band-stub}}
